price: Mos vër zot tjetër me Allahun, se do të mbetesh i poshtëruar dhe i braktisur!
arabic: لَّا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَذۡمُومٗا مَّخۡذُولٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: lā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fataqʿuda madhmūman makhdhūlan
